environment_variables.X10_NPLACES: variable used to define the number of places
environment_variables.X10_NTHREADS: variable used to define the number of threads per place
environment_variables.NCPUS: variable used to calculate the number of cpus by multiplying X10_NPLACES and X10_THREADS
environment_variables.VMEM: variable used to define the total memory in GB, calculated by multiplying NCPUS by 2
